title: Video: The Very Best – Kondaine (feat. Seye)
body:
Doing things by the book isn’t the finest trait that **The Very Best** posses, summarized perfectly by this new video for recent single _Kondaine_.

Taking it’s name from a ‘magic potion’ the group flew out to Northern Kenya to shoot their interactions with the Turkana tribe and the local witch doctors. If nothing else, it’s completely and utterly bizarre, and well worthy of a watch, be warned however, as there are scenes of a graphic nature.
